vulnerability_findings.name: reentrancy-eth
vulnerability_findings.message:
Reentrancy in SimpleDAO.withdraw (patch_6.sol#11-19):
	External calls:
	- msg.sender.call.value(amount)() (patch_6.sol#14-16)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- credit (patch_6.sol#15)
	- frozenAccount (patch_6.sol#17)
